1.description: Assign privileges to a user or session.
1.caption: Assign Privileges to User

2.description: Assign groups to a user or session.
2.caption: Add User to Groups

3.description: Assign privileges to a group or role.
3.caption: Assign Privileges to Group

4.description: Assign groups to a group or role.
4.caption: Add Group to Groups

5.description: Remove privileges from a user or session.
5.caption: Revoke User Privileges

6.description: Remove a user or session from groups or roles.
6.caption: Remove User from Groups

7.description: Remove privileges from a group or role.
7.caption: Revoke Group Privileges

8.description: Remove a group from groups or roles.
8.caption: Remove Group from Groups
